commands.name: az csvmware vm-template list
commands.summary: List details of VMware virtual machines templates in a private cloud.
examples: az csvmware vm-template list -p MyPrivateCloud -r MyResourcePool --location eastus

commands.name: az csvmware vm-template show
commands.summary: Get the details of a VMware virtual machines template in a private cloud.
examples: az csvmware vm-template show  -n MyVmTemplate -p MyPrivateCloud --location eastus
